name: cardiomon
author: Michael van Laar <michael@van-laar.de> (https://michaelvanlaar.com/)

scripts.build: npm run clean && webpack --mode production && npx -y hashup
scripts.utility-dependencies-update:
node -e "console.log('==========================
UPDATING COMPOSER PACKAGES
==========================
')" && composer update -o && composer normalize && node -e "console.log('

=====================
UPDATING NPM PACKAGES
=====================
')" && ncu -u && npm install && npm audit --fix
scripts.utility-dependencies-update-check:
node -e "console.log('==========================
CHECKING COMPOSER PACKAGES
==========================
')" && composer outdated && node -e "console.log('

=====================
CHECKING NPM PACKAGES
=====================
')" && ncu

browserslist: > 0.1%, last 2 versions, Firefox ESR, not dead
